transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha ji madam boliye.
Executive: Good morning sir, Pooja baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye madam.
Executive: Wo aapka 12 baje video meet ke liye tha na sir? Available hai kya aap?
Customer: Ha available hai madam.
Executive: Aap kaise join karenge bataiye mujhe?
Customer: Hmm kis mein? Kis se aap batao?
Executive: Desktop hai aapke pass ya mobile hai abhi?
Customer: Desktop, mobile dono hai madam.
Executive: Desktop se kar lena zyada easy rahega.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ek minute call pe rahiyega main aapko video meet ka schedule kar dungi aapke time.
Customer: Ek baar main ha message kar do aap main meet ko chalu kar deta hu desktop pe.
Executive: Ha koi baat nahi jab tak chalu kariye call pe rahiye mujhe ek do chize waise puchni thi sir aapko.
Customer: Thik hai madam.


Executive: Sir isme jo aapke product add hai 25 product add hai na?
Customer: Ha add hai madam.
Executive: Aur ye aapne kuch inactive kar rakhe hai jaise ki white marble temple, Radha Krishna marble statue.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Kyu reason kya hai?
Customer: Kya matlab kya reason madam aapne?
Executive: Jaise ki ye Radha Krishna marble statue hai. White marble temple hai. Ye aapne inactive kar rakhe hai stock mein nahi hai kya dikkat hai bataiye?
Customer: Nahi madam inko active karna hai maine kuch bhi nahi kar rakha madam abhi tak inko nahi dala hai aapke.
Executive: Achha kuch bhi nahi kara abhi tak aapne?
Customer: Ek dam.

Executive: Mail ID login hai sir abhi aapke pass?
Customer: Ha madam. Aap wo jo aap ispe bhejoge wo mereko uspe bhejiye madam kya bolte hai. Whatsapp pe daliye madam usko. Jo aap ispe wo daloge na video conferencing ke liye aap.
Executive: Achha whatsapp pe matlab link bhejiye kehna chah rahe ho na?
Customer: Ha ha ha ha.
Executive: Okay.

Executive: Sir ek baar mobile number whatsapp mobile number confirm karenge kya hai?
Customer: Bataiye madam 96 9680806819.
Executive: Sir dheere bataiye.
Customer: 968080
Executive: 968080
Customer: 6819
Executive: 6 6819
Customer: Ha ji.

Executive: Ye aapka maine whatsapp pe message kiya hoga na isme aapko.

Executive: Connectivity band ho gayi madam.

Executive: Connect. Ye aapka hai.
Executive: Connect ho raha hai kya?
Executive: Sir aap please connect kar lijiye maine aapko whatsapp pe bhej diya hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Maine aapko bhej diya hai thik hai madam aapne. Ab waha se ek baar connect kariye hum aapka ye aapka welcome call bhi ho jayega aur dusri chize discuss bhi ho jayegi. Aajiye video meet pe main ek baar earphones connect kar lu jab tak thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay aajiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to join the video meet.

- Products are inactive on the portal.

- Wants the video meet link on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the video meet link on WhatsApp.

- Executive asked to connect through the link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect through the link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, whatsapp, products, inactive
